title: Brooklin Becker
text:
Student of the iSchool’s Bachelor of Information at the University of Toronto, with a background in Criminology & Sociolegal Studies. Expert communicator. Masterful collaborator. Thrives in environments which demand adaptability and agility, and value cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about utilizing information and technology to create a shared understanding of the formal and informal systems which sustain legal, political, and cultural structures.

Professional Experience
UofT Office of the Vice President for Research and Innovation | Toronto, ON | Data Curator and Analyst | Sept. 2024 - Current
UofT Innovation Hub | Toronto, ON | UX Researcher and Copywriter | April 2024 - Current
UofT Student Engagement | Toronto, ON | Campus Organizations Assistant | Sept. 2023 - August 2024
UofT Student Engagement | Toronto, ON | Special Projects Assistant | Sept. 2022 - April 2023
